message.body: I'm in the lounge!
I am dressed for the gym but might just go after e sem
Ok cool
In celebration of Trans Awareness week I've had to tell both of my Trans friends I can not handle them right now, school, them texting me too much to be appropriate, ect

In response they have both tried to do my homework for me. I am so confused by this weird racket I am running and so grateful that the Honors professors told me how to properly "they say, I say" so as not to plagiarize
Oh my god, you are like a mofia boss of education.
Heading over now
Where is your Esem
Goodheart, where your piano is..
Cool mine too. Want to meet at the piano?
Oooo Goodhart! Nm
Where is it?
U gymin?
I didn't get much good news from CDubb :( I don't understand why everyone got such duifferent amts!
Oh no, what about the housing that they were charging you for?
Don't know :p
I'm not really surprised though. Minorly disappointed but...I've been disappointed by financial aid before :) I have a playlist prepared for this as well. I hope you got better news
Oh man I'm so sorry honey. That's a bummer. I did get some good news but found out a check has been waiting for me at the one stop desk since oct 26 and no one bothered to notify me
Hahaha nice
Now instead of homework I'm looking at toys from the feminist sex shop in Portland
Haahaha the place in Philly, passional boutique, has great stuff
Do they have a strictly feminist ethos?
They're pretty good. I wouldn't say strictly... But they're local and support local artists! The toy I mentioned earlier was fashioned by a local glass blower!
Nice! This place is called she-bop, it's so good. It's all that is right with Portland
Haha wanna run?
Ugh, I did this morning already! I need to head home early today...I did more backwards, with crazy incline
Lol!!
All I want from my Bryn Mawr education is a crazy butt and legs
Hahaha you're well on your way friend
I know I love it!
ï¿¼Yes...come teach me science for sex Dr man.....
It's a beautiful trade off!
Lol. I'm not complaining. This sex for knowledge thing is a great idea. I don't know why I didn't think of it earlier
Hahahahahaha
Yeah, I'm kind of over sex for hassle
Nice!!! Lol
Science and sex are intrinsically linked!
It's unavoidable.
On this line, can one determine science to be sexy? Or conversely, sex to be sciency?
I think both statements are undeniably true..
Gym?
Blah I haven't even gotten out of bed
Which means I should probably go to the gym
Yes I did
Did you skip e sem?
You are my hero
All we did was talk about vulvas last time. I think I have a strong grasp on that material
The gym is my only source of joy lately
Haha same I'm comin to gym it up w u
Jay disappeared into the iPhone abyss and I'm cranky
Lol yep. Same, and yet I still feel productive
It's what I do instead of the magnitudes or work
Oh no!
You feel productive because of the gym!
Maybe I shouldntve pushed the sister wives topic. Our convo yesterday did get strange
Yes!
Or at least endorphiny
I need to hear this! I'm going to eat half an avocado and then head down
Haha ok I'm going to throw on some exercise clothes and Jog over
I'm heeeere!
Was this all a big gym ruse?
Lol
Sorry, I was eating my avo and bitching about school. I'm on my way
I can't wait to stretch
I'm stretching right now!!
Maybe I should just marry a dr instead of being one (anti-agency/feminism thought of the day$
If nothing else I've become more/realized how evil I truly am as of late.
Yeah I've been feeling like a bad person too. Or a soulless one anyway. If we married doctors we could just stretch all day!
Hahahahahagaha yes!
And draw birds!
Oof...soulless is heavy. Or conversely, light?
Lol why? Her high moral standards?
Yeah, twenty year old me would hate now me
She just had so many firm opinions about things
Lol! I think 6 year old Taj would LOVE current taj...and 6 was the best year of my life!!! 20 year old taj would hate current Taj because 20 year old taj hated joy and happiness and life
What about little kid Meg?
Would she approve?
Yeah! In my twenties I used to hate happiness! I said that people were assholes for hoping to be happy. Yeah, kid meg would be ok with me. She'd like that my hair is getting longer!
Hahahahahaha awesome! I sounds like we probably would have gotten along our entire life. Your hair is growing so fast!
7 year old me would love my long hair. 6 year old me would probably question my pursuit of embodying a female archetype. I was still trying to blur gender boundaries at that point
Haha, yeah six is a time of exploration and discovery..good thing you got it out of your system by seven

Is it? I remember 7 getting considerably more complicated. I wasn't able to achieve any sort of female archetype status until I was 17 and by the time I figured out how to be a "pretty girl" I couldn't handle the consequences!
Although, to be fair, it's helped me land jobs...the only time I couldn't get a job was when I shaved my head...but then I ended up with a real job for once at a hospital! Jury's still out. :)
I'm going to stop pestering you and get my work done :)
You and I sound like similar kids. I realized too late that I was hot and was stigmatized by feeling nerdy so then I had no inhibitions.
Making my early twenties sometimes awkward
I love the stair machine thingy
Right!!!!! Ass blaster!
I want to major in gym
Maybe a concentration?
Jay just double broke up with me
I'm in a state of indifference
What tha fuck??
I know!
Did you tell him he can't break up with you twice?
Hahaha no I was incredibly awesome and just told him that although I understand, I also think he's silly because I'm so awesome
Good call. It is silly. He is creating unnecessary drama. Tell him to keep his cats face out of your phone this time
Hahahahahaha actually I did
Good! Boundaries!
It's nice not being the crazy one for once
How's Gilgamesh
Yeah, not being the crazy one gives you a lot to think about regarding all of the times you were the crazy one
Taking a lot of margin notes...for demonstrative purposes
Lol!
Trying to read, can only think of stair machine
Haven't gone to bed, hate liiiiiife
Haven't finished anything but scholarship essay. Hurray, funding so that I can fail out of school
You just caught me in the middle of sending jay a probably unecessisary text
I miss honors where people liked to fucking talk about the papers we wrote and it helped everyone
Haha, oh no! I'm glad I stopped you. I know, I miss read throughs
You haven't slept at all??
My professor sent out an email saying we as a class aren't doing the hard work of making connections in our exams. I'm honestly afraid I'm going to get a C for the class
My GPA is going to be shit here
Also I may be developing (redeveloping?) an eating disorder
Oh no!!!! Don't do that!
I'm trying super hard not to redevelop one either. Are you sure you just aren't broke and enjoying exercise a lot?
It happens some times..I just noticed last night that I was more afraid of food than usual
Sometimes I go into eating disorder mode out of poor-girl necessity. But why do u think ur scrrrd?
Right? That probably started it. I'm not giving in, but I think I am just being super body conscious. Maybe it is from being around 18 yos all the time
I still ate a burger for dinner so I think I'm ok ha

Don't let that get to you. You still have the body of a fawn like goddess :) I thought you were younger than me when we first met and totally experienced tit envy. And like, my tits and body are pretty great, so, just sayin
Good! Yay for burgers!
And it's good that you have a meta awareness of it too
Awesome!! You are!! Now to write my scholarship essay. How long is yours?
A page

But I couldn't format it right so it has these stupid extra big spaces between paragraphs. Fortunately I wasn't professing to be a Comp Sci major so I think I'm good. Also, I don't think it even needs to be a page long.
I'm going to ride about honors, ha
Oh fuck I didn't even mention that! How quickly I forget...
Hahaha.
That's kind of funny because its all we talk about
I know. I miss it so
ï¿¼Is this where you work??
Lol.
Where u at?
No but I like that!!!!
Standing in a field. W where u? I don't have class till one
Hahahaha me neither!!! What field?
Meet in cloisters?
I'm close
In front of campus center, walking toward Thomas
Yes!
I got another C
I'm sorry
Next semester is going to be better! And this semester isn't over either
We just met to discuss my paper and I'm feeling so down about it. : (
I'm sorry :( can I buy you a drink? Did you go home?
Aw, thanks, I did go home. I'll be ok, I just don't like it
You will be ok. The teachers here really crack the whip but I think it gets better and they prob just want to see you do what you both know you're capable of. :)

Yeah, it wasn't totally awful. He said he was surprised I did so bad, and that he thinks I will get it, but the concepts take getting used to. He's just so smart and serious that I can't charm him with my personality AT all hahA
Hahahahahahaha
I HATE when that happens!!!
I don't know what to do when charming doesn't work
I know! That moment of silence when they are trying to figure out what you are talking about, and you don't "really" know, and they don't intend on finishing your ideas for you...
Hahahahahaha
Yep
Beeeeeen there
I'm about to fall asleep backstage at this Schubert concert
You just sleep wherever you can!
Lol is that advice or an observation?
Well it was an observation, but fuck it! It's now advice!
Lol! YESS!!!
The things we do instead of doing school work...
I was writing an essay back here
But I kind of have it already so now I can just chillax the rest of the concert. There's a dude singing poetry in a German baritone with a rad piano accompaniment
That's the name of my essay actually haha
Totally switching to orchestra major
Haha, maybe we can collaborate when I get my phd in gym
Our thesis can be you tap dancing and me playing my bass on that thing in the wildflowers like we planned!
We always knew that was our true calling! It spoke to us. We should make that as performance art in the spring no matter what
Agreed
I've moved from writing a paper to texting myself about it as if the main character is a dumbass (he is)
He may also have syphlis
At least Schubert did
Pretty much. HATEHATEHATE
Haha...your paper will just be u talking shit
Man this paper got so much easier once I started properly hating on it
Cause dude in this story suuuuuuucks
Think of him as we think of all the other dudes we hate!
I pretty much do. He leaves his lady to go wander in the snow and CAN NOT handle it! He just wines and lines and gets paranoid and crys himself to sleep at night
Oh good. He's finally found the light in the darkness. Good move dude.
Haha..hey he's just livin'
True. I'm glad he's finally getting it together. He was really whining a whole lot
Also, I think Jay is coming out to Bryn Mawr tomorrow.
I know!!
Well I'm out here now, come to me people!
Whhhhhhaaaat!
Make em work for it!
This has been a weird Transawareness week. That's for sure
What are you up to tonight?
Haahaha
Today I saw a table advertising feminism and I ignored it when I saw they didn't have cupcakes or treats
I almost laughed out loud and dropped my iPad
Tonight I'm trying to get a first draft of the Gilgamesh paper : /
But it's Gilgamesh! You can do it!!
PS I scored a meeting with R. Barto as a McBride Rep to wring some fucking answers out of her so that someone knows once and for all what the fuckin deal is. Any Q's you want me to answer
Oh awesome. Grill her! Nothing I can think of now, too poor to think..
Only when I have work to do, I decide to run security checks on my computer...
Hahaha
You may have some things that need dusting too
Jay is in fact coming out and I am super sick!
Sick because you are nervous or really sick?
I also got some cute butches phone number last night (maybe heart) so if things don't work out tonight!
Nope I have the flu/upper respiratory infection
Oh no, I'm sorry hon
I was also invited to be in the Swarthmore jazz band! I feel going out last night was still worth it, even though it gave me the flu
Wow! Are you going to join?
I don't know...it's the same day as orchestra. I was planning on joining the Bryn Mawr one my Sr year because they have a bassist already, and he's better than me.
You really are going to just major in music. Did you see my tap video?
Haha no! What?!
Actually I'majoring in schmoozing
It's on Facebook, just some brainstorming for our performance
Now I am deleting old emails..paper due in 3.5 hours...
Hahaha do your damn paper!
Just crank it out in 2 hrs then laugh and smoke for the last hr!
Agency!
Did u finish it?
Yes, with time to spare. And my apartment and inbox are clean. And I made an elaborate end of semester to do calendar
Wow! Killing it!
I'm just flulike
But it was a nice day, and so nice to see Jay
Although I completely failed at playing stone cold
I know :( it's not
Oh that's awful! Your immune system needs to hold out for two more weeks
Were you sentimental?
Haahaha I had to look that up in my dictionary app to make sure I knew exactly what it meant! What is wrong with me? I don't know what sentimental or empathy mean! Emotional retard over here
Yes..I was sentimental I suppose. I was pretty honest.
Aw, sick sentimental girl. What did he do?
Gave me lots of hugs, described his fears of moving forward with me, told me how obsessed with me he is, talked about duck graffiti and said he needs to be brave...something like that
It was weird and cute and a little confusing. But he's doing a horrible job of breaking up with me if that's his end game
Ugh.
right? Speaking of agency, someone needs to grow a pair
It apparently isn't..
He needs to learn the words you have been learning! It's ok to be confused, but it seems like he is too quick to share things with you. He should meditate on them a bit first
My rherapist always tells me I don't always have to react when the sirens go off
Hahahahahaha he does need to learn those words!
He could probably use some therapy (like the rest of us)
But I think he does mull stuff over for a while...he just seems so fragile. It makes me want to hug him even more because be was apparently in a really good place a couple of months ago
And then what happened?
he left
I need to add that I've had a fever all day
i don't know...it got him to come over actually
Hmmm. That's so rough. And yeah, being sick and vulnerable isn't helping u
I'm listening to my neighbors have a party while I read and write, read and write
All work and no play
I may have to reconsider this "cold sex goddess" thing...maybe being a little more mortal could help this situation.
Well...they're not going to be mawrters or be Indiana jones badass geniuses like you
So let em party.
Haha..if I can stop getting Cs
